string-array.name: crisis_plan_date
string-array.item:
People can still experience a crisis when they have utilised the best resources available.
Formulate a plan of action before the crisis happens - wherever possible, involve the person who has a mental health condition in this plan.
Listing phone numbers of the mental health providers and the mental health crisis team
Listing current medications and their dosages
Treatments that have been used in the past
Identify key words or calming techniques that have worked in the past
Talk with others in the household about how to stay safe during a crisis.

Samples of a Crisis Plan and a Carer Plan are available on the ARAFMI website ${type=2|title=www.arafmiillawarra.org.au/crisis-information|content=http://www.arafmiillawarra.org.au/crisis-information|typeface=NORMAL|fontcolor=#1E90FF}
